snippet: South Carolina is headed back to the College World Series after beating visiting Oklahoma, 5-1, for its 21st straight N.C.A.A. tournament win.
abstract: South Carolina is heading back to the College World Series of baseball after beating visiting Oklahoma, 5-1, for its 21st straight NCAA tournament win; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: South Carolina is headed back to the College World Series after beating visiting Oklahoma, 5-1, for its 21st straight N.C.A.A. tournament win.

headline.seo: South Carolina Advances to College World Series
headline.main: South Carolina Advances to College World Series
